name: SHOOTER SPACE
description: The vicious alien animals with technology beyond that of your race has besiege the solar system, they pillage the worlds and taking plunder back to their conclave hidden in the asteroid belt. Suddenly a fair youth barely old enough to have hair sprouting from their armpits has been telepathically summoned by an ancient star ship hidden in the deep jungles of the southern continent. You have been called to pilot the only weapon that might save the future. Now go with haste and dynamic intensity for the destiny you were born to live. Up into space! All their base belong to you!
